ComicInfo.Summary:
It's a murder mystery at Strange Academy, and not the fun kind with the pretend roles.
Toth has been shattered and everyone is a suspect.
Can the teachers discover Whodunit? Could it be ONE OF THEM?!?!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Humberto Ramos & Edgar Delgado | 1 | Var | Character Spotlight Variant Cover (Zelma Stanton) | Art Adams & Edgar Delgado | 2 |
